NK015(ba)021:0: gtang rag mchod bstod bya ba /
NK015(ba)021:3: stong pa'i ngang las mchod snod dbyings kyi zhing khams
NK015(ba)021:4: bsam gyis mi khyab par mchod rdzas ye shes lnga'i
NK015(ba)021:5: rnam rol 'dod yon gyi rnam pa ma lus pa
NK015(ba)021:6: so so'i lha mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa nam mkha'
NK015(ba)021:7: gang bar gyur / badz+ra ar+g+ham pra tits+tsha +aahmh'u /
NK015(ba)021:9: +aahmh'u sarba pany+tsa a mri ta h'u h+r+aihtha /
NK015(ba)021:10: ma h+aa rak+ta dz+wa la man+dala h'u h'u h'u phata /
NK015(ba)021:11: +aahmh'u ma h+aa ba ling+ta te dz+wa ba ling+ta b+ha
NK015(ba)021:12: la b+ha te gu h+ya sa ma ye s+w+aa h+aa
NK015(ba)021:14: na mahsarba ta th+aa ga ta b+h+yo sogs /
NK015(ba)021:16: d+h+au pe gan+d+he la s+ye h'u /
NK015(ba)021:18: girti h+r+aih nirti +aah ma h+aa sarba pany+tsa a mri ta kha ram kh+aa hi /
NK015(ba)021:19: ma h+aa rak+ta ma h+aa ba ling+ta zhes mchod de /
NK015(ba)021:20: sangs rgyas gsang ba'i rgya gzhung las byung ba'i /
NK015(ba)021:21: khyod ni glang po'i rna ba can //
NK015(ba)021:22: khyod ni seng ge'i stang stabs can //
NK015(ba)021:23: khyod ni pha ltar skyobs pa'o //
NK015(ba)021:24: khyod ni ma ltar byams pa'o //
NK015(ba)021:26: khyod ni chu ltar sdud pa'o //
NK015(ba)021:27: khyod ni gzugs sdug yid kyis brgyan //
NK015(ba)021:28: khyod ni rlung ltar gtor ba'o //
NK015(ba)021:29: khyod ni sprin ltar lding ba'o //
NK015(ba)021:31: thams cad ngo bo mnyam nyid sku //
NK015(ba)021:32: bde chen gar dbang sku gsung thugs //
NK015(ba)021:33: mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo yi //
NK015(ba)021:34: he ru ka la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK015(ba)021:37: ho rgyal ba rgya mtsho mnyes par gyur cig /
NK015(ba)021:38: dam can rgya mtsho thugs dam bskang bar gyur cig /
NK015(ba)021:39: mchod pa rgya mtsho gnas su stobs par gyur cig /
NK015(ba)021:40: srid pa rgya mtsho dbyings su grol bar gyur cig /
NK015(ba)021:41: dam tshig rgya mtsho skong bar gyur cig /
NK015(ba)021:42: bdud dpung rgya mtsho bcom par gyur cig /
NK015(ba)021:43: bgegs dpung rgya mtsho zhig par gyur cig /
NK015(ba)021:44: 'khor ba rgya mtsho stongs par gyur cig /
NK015(ba)021:45: sdug bsngal rgya mtsho zhi bar gyur cig /
NK015(ba)021:46: bdag nyid chen por lhun gyis grub par gyur cig /
NK015(ba)021:47: sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub thob par gyur cig /
NK015(ba)021:48: de dag ni sangs rgyas gsang ba'i rgyan bcu'i rgya gzhung las so //
NK015(ba)021:49: yig brgya lan gsum gyis nong pa bshags /
NK015(ba)021:50: phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol /
NK015(ba)021:51: ji srid nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i sems can
NK015(ba)021:52: thams cad mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i
NK015(ba)021:53: sa la ma bzhag gi bar du rgyal ba rnams
NK015(ba)021:54: mya ngan las mi 'da' bar brtan par bzhugs su
NK015(ba)021:55: gsol / bye brag tu bskyed cing spyan drangs pa'i
NK015(ba)021:56: lha tshogs rnams rten 'di nyid la brtan par bzhugs
NK015(ba)021:57: gsol / su gsol / bzhugs nas kyang byin gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol /
NK015(ba)021:58: su pra tish+tha badz+ra ye s+w+aa h+aa /
NK015(ba)021:59: zin nyin ras bris la brtan bzhugs /
NK015(ba)021:60: rdul tshon dang tshom bu la /
NK015(ba)021:61: khyed kyi sems can tshogs kyis gshegs gsol bya'o //
